name: Dubious Mushrooms
description:
Farm mushrooms on a precariously balanced plateau at the bottom of a dark well. Mushrooms grow best in the dark, along the platform edges, but this also makes the platform unstable.

Bigger mushrooms means better combos and points but also brings higher risk.

Get the highest score and leave the well, before plummeting into the dark!

See our progress here:
